keyEvents.title: Saul's Final Stand
keyEvents.description: Jaguar D. Saul makes his last stand against the Marines to protect Robin and the scholars.
keyEvents.significance: The tragic conclusion of the Ohara incident that shaped Robin's entire life.

keyEvents.title: Evacuation Ship Destroyed
keyEvents.description: Sakazuki orders the destruction of the civilian evacuation ship from Ohara.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the Marines' ruthlessness and traumatizes young Robin.

keyEvents.title: Robin Escapes Ohara
keyEvents.description: Kuzan helps young Robin escape the burning island on an ice path.
keyEvents.significance: Robin's survival allows her story to continue and eventually find the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.description: Completely destroyed by the Buster Call

notableFeatures: Tree of Knowledge - massive library containing world history
Home of world's greatest archaeologists and scholars
One of few places where people could read Poneglyphs

reveals.information: Final moments of Ohara's destruction shown in detail

keyEvents.title: Declaration of War on the World Government
keyEvents.description: Luffy orders Sogeking to shoot down the World Government flag flying above Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: The Straw Hats officially declare war on the World Government from this location.

keyEvents.title: World Government Flag Burned
keyEvents.description: Sogeking burns the World Government flag with his Fire Bird Star attack.
keyEvents.significance: Symbolic destruction of the World Government's authority at their own judicial island.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Declaration
keyEvents.description: Robin declares she wants to live while standing at Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: The emotional climax of the Enies Lobby arc happens at this location.

notableFeatures: One of three main World Government facilities
Gateway to the Marine headquarters and Impel Down
Has perpetual daylight - never experiences night
Location of the Gates of Justice

reveals.information: Site where the Straw Hats declared war on the World Government
